sentences.english: All equipments of the high-purity magnesite making are introduced from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 高純鎂砂生產工藝的全部設備均由國外引進。

sentences.english: The difference of magnesia between sea water and brine is discussed in particular.
sentences.chinese: 特別是討論了海水與滷水鎂砂之間的區別。

sentences.english: The characteristics of sea water and brine magnesia are described.
sentences.chinese: 詳述了海水與滷水鎂砂的特點。

sentences.english: The research and development of magnesia from sea water and brine in China are demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 文章論證了我國海水和滷水鎂砂的研究與開發。

sentences.english: Moreover the opinions of the development of magnesia from sea water or brine in China are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 而且，提出了我國海水與滷水鎂砂發展意見。

sentences.english: This is a hybrid magnesia low chromite brick made from dead burned magnesia.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種由重燒鎂砂製成的混合型低鉻鎂磚。
